positive_phenotypes: extensively prolonged duration of action of mivacurium

explanation.num_tested_probands: The patient was a healthy 30-yr-old man... suggests a single proband was tested in this study.
explanation.num_positive_het_probands: The text does not mention any probands who were heterozygous for a pathogenic variant.
explanation.positive_phenotypes: The patient was a healthy 30-yr-old man (American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status I) scheduled for correction of the inner nose. The response to mivacurium was an extensively prolonged duration of action. The patient’s BChE activity was zero, indicating that he was homozygous for silent mutations.
explanation.num_compound_or_double_hets: The patient was compound heterozygous for silent mutations in the butyrylcholinesterase gene. This indicates there is one compound heterozygote.
